quotes.author: atticus
quotes.quote: The more I live, the more I see we are a forest full off wolves howling at the same moon thinking we are alone.

quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absense of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.

quotes.author: Rob Cardell
quotes.quote: Some people have an inner child that speaks to them. I have an inner old man who just yells random stuff at me all day.

quotes.author: Henry von Dyke Jr.
quotes.quote: Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.

quotes.author: William H. Gass
quotes.quote: The true alchemists do not change lead into gold; they change the world into words.

quotes.author: Princess Diana
quotes.quote: Carry out a random act of kindess, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better do better.

quotes.author: David Feherty
quotes.quote: It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: Failure doesn't mean game over, it means try again with experience
